item.title: About
item.description: About me I’m a Frontend Developer at Hetzner Cloud since 2020. I got my education from an apprenticeship at United Internet / 1&1 from 2017 to 2020. Before that I attendet German High School (Realschule). At my day-to-day job I use mostly Angular, TypeScript, Jest, Karma, Storybook and Cypress. In me free time I’m working on more of less serious projects in Rust and JavaScript which you can find on GitHub .
